20.heading: Verandas.
20.title: "Parable!"
20.author: J
20.appears_in: DeFuccio & Severin. p. 84-91 in Cartoonist Profiles, no. 39 (Sept. 1978).
notes: Begins: "Afghanistan, the 1880s! At Kandahar, on the British northwest frontier, Sergeant Patrick Tubridy and a correspondent of the London Daily Press stand on the canteen verandah, in the intense summer heat. They regard the mountainous links that form the mighty chain of the Hindu-Kush."
